casebody.data:
In re the Foreclosure of BROWN. No. 224PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 29, 2015. Wilder Wadford, Weaverville, for Brown, Grover C., et al. Adam W. Bull, Asheville, for Almond, Nelson T. (Executor), et al. John R. Dillard, for First Choice Title, LLC.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 29th of September 2015 by Petitioner:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of September 2015."

Petitioner shall have up to and including the 9th day of November 2015 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
